alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:34PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 600 PM PDT... At 533 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Oasis, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Silver Zone Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for northeastern Nevada.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
